channel.title: Teaching on Joe Starr
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Joe Starr

item.title: ISA:1040 Entering Research
item.description: This seminar series is designed to support success and professional development of students in science majors who are affiliated with the Iowa Sciences Academy.

item.title: ISA:4040 Teaching Your Undergraduate Research
item.description: Scientific teaching principles (e.g., backwards design, active learning, formative assessment)

item.title: ISA:4041 Senior Capstone Project
item.description: Structure for development, planning, and implementation of a culminating project for the Iowa Sciences Academy

item.title: MATH:5760 Mathematical Biology II (Module 6: Machine Learning)
item.description: Topics in mathematical biology; canonical mathematical modeling and analysis of problems in the biological sciences; second of a two-semester sequence.

item.title: MATH:1350 Quantitative Reasoning for Business
item.description: Mathematics and Reasoning for business students
